General.Name: Holand og Setskog Sparebank
General.Description: Høland og Setskog Sparebank provides banking services for the retail and corporate markets in Norway. It offers deposits and loans, as well as insurance products. The company was formerly known as Holand Sparebank and changed its name to Høland og Setskog Sparebank in 2010. The company was founded in 1849 and is headquartered in Bjørkelangen, Norway.
